a:1:{s:9:"spip_meta";a:10:{s:5:"field";a:4:{s:3:"nom";s:48:"VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COLLATE NOCASE";s:6:"valeur";s:30:"text DEFAULT '' COLLATE NOCASE";s:4:"impt";s:50:"VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'oui' NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE";s:3:"maj";s:9:"TIMESTAMP";}s:3:"key";a:1:{s:11:"PRIMARY KEY";s:3:"nom";}s:5:"exist";b:1;s:9:"table_sql";s:9:"spip_meta";s:5:"table";s:9:"spip_meta";s:9:"connexion";s:0:"";s:5:"titre";s:22:"'' as titre,'' as lang";s:4:"date";s:0:"";s:6:"statut";s:0:"";s:16:"tables_jointures";a:0:{}}}
